properties.areaDesc: James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 3:49AM EST until January 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
waves around 2 ft expected.

* WHERE...James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads
Bridge-Tunnel.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
